title: WHAT DID YOU DO TO RYZE???!!!
body:
Where is my Spell vamp

Where is my R cdr??!!!

WHERE is my 50% bonus aoe dmg?!! and my 6 stack arcane shield??!!!

WHY!!! He was already re-worked 3x in the last year!

replies.body:
you know why.. come on man.. 
dont play...
you know why..
Spell Vamp isn't fair? You cooldowns are so low you don't need CDR, which is why I think Ryze needs some CD nerfs.

now he's even easier

literally just eqeqeqeqeqeqeqeq and that's your full combo

You still get the shield if you cast E,W then Q.  But yeah they got rid of the CDR and spell vamp. 

 He still does a lot of AOE if you combo the abilites right(Q then E,then E on the same target, then Q on any one of the targets with the E on them does 200% of your Q damage in aoe and you can repeat it every 1.24 seconds with 45% cdr).
Guy dont worry he will be reworked again by Christmas.......also the 2017 January rework is already complete and the 2017 March rework is halfway done.
